After Their Grand Wedding In Jodhpur, PC-Nick To Host Reception In Delhi And Mumbai!
The celebrations have already begun for Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra, who are all set to tie the knot in December. PC and Nick got engaged in a traditional Roka ceremony in August.
Instagram
Nick proposed to PC with a Tiffany diamond ring that approximately costs Rs 2.1 crore. Nick Jonas flew down to Delhi yesterday to be with his ladylove PC, who is shooting for 'The Sky Is Pink' in the capital.
Fresh reports claim that Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas’ wedding will be followed by two receptions, one in Mumbai and another in Delhi.
The celebrations will begin for the couple from November 29. The couple will tie the knot at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jodhpur on December 2 as per Hindu traditions, which will reportedly be followed by a Christian wedding on December 3.
